plot: Olga Petroff, the cleverest spy in Petrograd, strives to recover secret documents from a Secret Service agent, but romance gets in the way.
title: The Accounting
plot_es: Olga Petroff, the cleverest spy in Petrograd, strives to recover secret documents from a Secret Service agent, but romance gets in the way.
plot_en: Olga Petroff, the cleverest spy in Petrograd, strives to recover secret documents from a Secret Service agent, but romance gets in the way.
